text: Mangalore is the chief port city of the Indian state of Karnataka. Mangalore may also refer to: ==Related to Mangalore, India== * Mangalore Dasara, a festival * Mangalore Central railway station * Mangalore Junction railway station * Mangalore taluk * Mangalore tiles * Mangalore University * Mangaloreans * Mangalorean Catholics ==Other locations== * Mangalore, Tasmania * Mangalore, Victoria == People== * Mangalore Anantha Pai (born 1931), power engineer and academic * Mangalore Gopal Kini (died 1952), orthopedic surgeon ==Other== * Mangalores, a fictional alien race in The Fifth Element
title: Mangalore (disambiguation)
